name: The Taming Power of the Small
hexagram: The Taming Power of the Small
description: The Gate of Focus - The power of detail and focus through determination

channel.name: Concentration
channel.description: The Channel of Concentration - A Design Focused on Determination

signal.script: Your power lives in singular focus. What one thing deserves your full attention right now?
experiments: Commit to one focus for a defined period
Practice deep work sessions with full presence

friction.script: Your determination is valuable, but so is knowing when to pivot. Is your focus serving you or has it become rigid?
experiments: Assess if you're focused on the right thing
Notice where persistence has become obstinacy

breakpoint.trigger: Burnout from excessive focus or lost direction
breakpoint.script: Your capacity for focus is reorganizing. Sometimes we must unfocus to find true north again.
experiments: Explore without agenda for a set period
Return to what fascinated you before pressure entered
